full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal

**RFP title:** Data and Analytics Digital Transformation Services
**RFP No.:** WS4211053577

### Important Dates

* **Solicitation Publication Date:** September 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 6, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Contract Start Date:** December 27, 2023 (expected)

### Overview 

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Data and Analytics Digital Transformation Services. This RFP seeks to select a contractor to provide Informatics professional services with expertise and experience in Data and Analytics digital transformations. 

**Scope**

The successful contractor will provide as-and-when-required Informatics professional services to support the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) in achieving its business objectives. The services should include data and analytics digital transformations. 

**Contract Period**

A two-year contract with three one-year irrevocable options will be awarded. The contractor must have experience and expertise in data and analytics digital transformations and have a Tier 2 position in the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply. 

**Eligibility**

Only TBIPS SA Holders holding a TBIPS SA for Tier 2 at the time of bid closing, in all required resource categories in the solicitation under the EN578-170432 series of SAs, are eligible to compete. 

**Contact Information**

For more information on how to become a qualified TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holder, please contact RCN MDAI-NCrimos at: [rcnmdai.-ncrimos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rcnmdai.-ncrimos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). 

### Available Attachments

None.

### Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17569017](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17569017) (External Site: MTc1NjkwMTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Cancellation Warning

Please note that there are no attachments available for this announcement. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on November 6, 2023, by 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT
